original_text:
Blackbeard’s Quest
Dei tanti temi che possono essere trovati nelle slot online, quello piratesco è uno dei più coerenti, dato il fascino che le storie di corsari esercitano ancora oggi e per i loro tesori nascosti e contrassegnati dalla famosa X.
Per questo non sorprende scoprire Blackbeard’s Quest della Tom Horn Gaming, una slot che ci porta nei Caraibi alla ricerca di tre diversi forzieri del tesoro.
In questa breve recensione andremo a vederne i vari aspetti, partendo da quello grafico e sonoro, per arrivare a quello più tecnico.
Blackbeard’s Quest – Una grafica semplice e colorata
Anche l’occhio vuole la sua parte, questo lo sappiamo bene, e il primo impatto che abbiamo con una slot è talvolta anche l’ultimo, se la grafica del titolo non dovesse rispondere al nostro gusto personale.
Questo può essere in parte il rischio con il gioco di oggi: Blackbeard’s Quest ha una grafica piuttosto semplice che non colpisce particolarmente positivamente il giocatore. I simboli che compongono la griglia di gioco si dividono tra quelli a tema piratesco (Barbanera, la piratessa e i forzieri) e quelli generici, i quali assumono la forma dei classici simboli delle carte da gioco (A, K, Q…).
Alcuni simboli sono dotati di un’animazione leggera che si innesca nel momento in cui si ottiene una combinazione vincente, ma che comunque rimane abbastanza dimenticabile.
Infine il comparto sonoro utilizza un motivetto che ricorda le canzoni marinare ma che viene interrotto alla fine di ogni giro.
Tirando le fila, ci troviamo di fronte a un gioco dotato di funzioni chiare e semplici e che quindi risponderà al gusto di molti giocatori, sebbene riteniamo che avrebbe potuto osare un po’ di più.
Blackbeard’s Quest – Infiniti giri gratuiti
Passiamo alla sezione che ci interessa maggiormente: il gameplay vero e proprio. Da un punto di vista prettamente tecnico, ci troviamo di fronte a una slot che utilizza cinque rulli con tre simboli su ognuno di essi. Se questo è uno schema molto utilizzato, il numero di linee di vincite è abbastanza ridotto, ovvero solo 9.
Di conseguenza, possiamo aspettarci un numero ridotto di vincite ma dal valore maggiore. Blackbeard’s Quest non è una slot che vuole rispondere al desiderio di vincita del giocatore dando pochi centesimi alla volta, ma ricompensandolo con vincite più alte in attesa di innescare la funzione speciale.
Questa verrà attivata solo trovando i tre scrigni, simboli Scatter diversi l’uno dall’altro e che si trovano sui rulli 1, 3 e 5. Trovandone 3 otterremo 10 giri gratuiti, durante i quali gli scrigni diventeranno simboli Wild a loro volta (unendosi al pirata che è un simbolo Wild anche nelle giocate normali).
Trovandone altri tre in un’unica giocata innescheremo nuovamente la funzione ottenendo altri dieci giri (cosa che è possibile ottenere più volte). In base alla nostra esperienza, la modalità a giri gratuiti è piuttosto facile da triggerare, rispetto ad altre slot.
Slot simili a Blackbeard’s Quest
Come abbiamo potuto dire in precedenza, non è raro trovare il tema piratesco all’interno del mondo delle slot online. Se cerchiamo quindi altri titoli di questo tipo, possiamo ricordare Captain Quid’s Treasure Chest, Captain’s Treasure, Pirates Paradise, Gold Ahoy, Pirates Charm, Captain Stack e molti, molti altri titoli ancora.
Se quelli che cerchiamo sono i corsari, abbiamo veramente l’imbarazzo della scelta.

raw_translation.response:
Blackbeard's Quest
Of the many themes that can be found in online slots, the pirate theme is one of the most consistent, given the charm that pirate stories still have today, and for their hidden treasures marked with the famous X. It is not surprising to discover Blackbeard’s Quest by Tom Horn Gaming, a slot that takes us to the Caribbean in search of three different treasure chests.

In this brief review, we will look at its various aspects, starting from the visual and sound effects, to get to the more technical aspects. Blackbeard’s Quest has a rather simple graphic that does not particularly impress the player positively.

Finally, the sound part uses a motif that recalls sea shanties, but is interrupted at the end of each spin. In short, we are faced with a game with clear and simple functions that will surely appeal to many players, although we believe that it could have dared a little more.

Blackbeard's Quest - Endless Free Spins
We move on to the section that interests us most: the actual gameplay. From a purely technical point of view, we are faced with a slot that uses five reels with three symbols on each of them. If this is a very common scheme, the number of pay lines is quite limited, only nine. Consequently, we can expect a reduced number of payouts but with a higher value.

Blackbeard's Quest is not a slot that wants to meet the player's desire to win by giving them a few cents at a time, but rewarding them with higher winnings while waiting to trigger the special function. This will only be activated by finding the three chests, different Scatter symbols, on reels 1, 3, and 5. Finding three will give us 10 free spins, during which the chests will turn into Wild symbols (joining the pirate, who is a Wild symbol even in normal gameplay).

Finding another three in a single spin will trigger the feature again, getting another ten spins (which can be obtained several times). In our experience, the free spin mode is quite easy to trigger compared to other slots.

Similar slots to Blackbeard's Quest
As we said before, it is not uncommon to find the pirate theme in the world of online slots. If we are looking for other titles of this kind, we can remember Captain Quid’s Treasure Chest, Captain’s Treasure, Pirates Paradise, Gold Ahoy, Pirates Charm, Captain Stack, and many, many other titles. If what we are looking for is pirates, we really are spoiled for choice.

response.headline: Gameplay mechanics
response.content: Blackbeard's Quest uses five reels with three symbols on each of them and only nine payment lines. The payouts occur rarely, but the value of the winnings is higher compared to slots that pay a few cents at a time. The pirate symbol is a Wild symbol, and it can substitute for all symbols except Scatter. When three Scatter symbols land on reels 1, 3, and 5, Blackbeard's Quest triggers 10 free spins; during these spins, the chests become Wild symbols themselves. If you land another three Scatters, you get ten additional free spins, and the feature can be triggered multiple times.

response.headline: Special features
response.content: The only special feature of Blackbeard's Quest is a free spins mode, triggered by finding three different Scatter symbols on reels 1, 3, and 5. The free spins mode offers 10 free spins during which the three chests become Wild symbols. If you land another three Scatters, you trigger ten additional free spins (and can do so multiple times).

response.headline: Theme and design
response.content: Blackbeard's Quest is a video slot machine featuring a pirate-inspired theme. The symbols on the reels include the pirate himself, the pirate's woman, the three Treasure Chests, the ship's steering wheel, a pistol, along with the traditional playing card symbols. Review: Blackbeard's Quest

Of the many themes that can be found in online slots, the pirate theme is one of the most consistent, given the fascination that pirate stories still exercise today for their hidden treasures marked by the famous X.

So it's no surprise to discover Tom Horn Gaming's Blackbeard's Quest, a slot that takes us to the Caribbean in search of three different treasure chests.

In this brief review, we will look at its various aspects, starting with the graphics and sound, and ending with the technical details.

Blackbeard's Quest - A simple and colorful graphic design

First impressions count, and sometimes they are also the last when it comes to slot titles whose graphics don't appeal to our personal tastes. This might be partly the case with today's game: Blackbeard's Quest has a rather simple graphic design that doesn't particularly impress the player positively.

The symbols that make up the game grid are divided between pirate-themed symbols (Blackbeard, the pirate woman and the treasure chests) and generic symbols, which take the form of classic playing card symbols (A, K, Q...). Some symbols have a light animation that is triggered when a winning combination is obtained, but it remains quite forgettable.

Finally, the sound effects use a tune reminiscent of sea shanties, but it's interrupted at the end of each spin.

Overall, we're looking at a game with clear and simple functions that will appeal to many players, although we believe it could have dared to be a bit more innovative.

Blackbeard's Quest - Endless free spins

Moving on to the section that interests us more: the actual gameplay. From a purely technical point of view, we have in front of us a slot that uses five reels with three symbols on each of them. While this is a widely used scheme, the number of payout lines is quite limited, only nine.

As a result, we can expect a reduced number of winnings, but with higher values. Blackbeard's Quest is not a slot that tries to satisfy the player's desire to win by giving out a few cents at a time, but by rewarding them with higher wins while waiting to trigger the special feature.

This will be activated only by finding the three chests, Scatter symbols different from each other, which can be found on reels 1, 3, and 5. By finding three, we will get ten free spins, during which the chests will become Wild symbols themselves (joining the pirate, who is a Wild symbol even in normal play).

Finding another three in a single spin will trigger the feature again, giving us another ten spins (which can be triggered many times). Based on our experience, the free spins mode is quite easy to trigger, compared to other slots.

Slots similar to Blackbeard's Quest

If we're therefore looking for other titles of this type, we can remember Captain Quid’s Treasure Chest, Captain’s Treasure, Pirates Paradise, Gold Ahoy, Pirates Charm, Captain Stack, and many, many other titles.
